title: Thani Oruvan Ninaithu Vittaal Lyrics Thani Oruvan
stanzas:
Thani Oruvan Ninaithu Vittaal Lyrics Thani Oruvan Songs Lyrics
#HipHopTamizha

look at me.
you can call me the mass disaster.
i am the monster.
never ever read my chapter.
i am a gangster
god is my freaking banker
money is the master
but thatâ€™s not why i am running after.
pistol pol kangal kondirukum
naan oruvan, indha ulagathil
yaar endhan pagaivan.
naan oru thani padai
naane endhan thalaivan.

thani oruvan ninaithuvittaal
indha ulagathil thadaigal illai.
thani oruvan ninaithuvittaal
indha ulagame thadaiyumillai

thavar izhaithalum
adhai thadupen naan
sudum theemaigalai
dhinam azhipen naan

sattai eduthu nattai thiruthu
ilam thalaimurai
thannai nee vazhi nadathu
theemaikedhiraai naanum varuven
thani oruvanai un mun padai eduthu

oru naal illai oru naal
indha ulagam azhiyum thozha
adhu naal varum munne
unnai vendru mudipen vaa da

thani oruvan ninaithuvittaal
indha ulagathil thadaigal illai.
thani oruvan ninaithuvittaal
indha ulagame thadaiyumillai

thavar izhaithalum
adhai thadupen naan
sudum theemaigalai
dhinam azhipaen naan

acham thavir, aanmai kol
theemaiyai azhithu pagaiyai vel(2)

acham thavir, aanmai kol
theeyadhai edhirthu pagaiyai vel
